summary: This bill, the "Tools to Address Known Exploitation by Immobilizing Technological Deepfakes on Websites and Networks Act" (TAKE IT DOWN Act), aims to combat the nonconsensual disclosure of intimate visual depictions, including those created using deepfake technology. It criminalizes the intentional publication of such depictions, providing exceptions for law enforcement and other specific circumstances. The bill also mandates that covered platforms establish a notice-and-takedown process for removing nonconsensual intimate visual depictions upon request. Enforcement of the bill falls under the Federal Trade Commission.
